With Memes & Jokes, Anil Kapoor Gives A Quick Recap Of Everything That Kept Us Hooked In 2018
New Year is around the corner, and party plans are already in the works. But if we look back at 2018, the year was a game changer, especially for Bollywood.
While in 2017, Over The Top media sevices(OTT) platforms could only make their presence felt, in 2018 they ruled in the entertainment industry. There were so many shows and so many movies – including Sacred Games, Breathe, Lust Stories, Inside Edge, Mirzapur and Ghoul – that released on streaming service platforms instead of the big screen. And one thing common between them was that – they all were big hits.
Going out and watching movies with friends is sure fun, but watching your favourite show tucked inside a blanket with just yourself is an experience of a different kind, right?
The technological revolution has brought the biggest stars of Bollywood on this whole new platform for Indian audiences. The era of daily soaps is probably going to end soon.

As OTT platforms like Netflix gained the edge in India this year, content emerged to the undisputed king, showing that it was just the beginning.
So, here’s a flashback at what kept you hooked through this year. If you have missed out on any of these shows, use the long weekend to catch up!
Which is the best show you watched in 2018? Tell us in the comments section below.
